title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Context-Based Ecosystem and Biodiversity Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Core ecological concepts and awareness of general environmental issues
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Create context-based lesson plans explaining the interconnections of ecosystems, biodiversity, and environmental issues
Present at least three environmental problem-solving strategies through case analyses connected to learners' daily lives

Learners design formative assessment tools (5-question quiz + 2 discussion questions) based on three service/customer interaction scenarios (e.g., complaint handling, reservation changes, urgent requests) within a week, and develop learning activities meeting at least 3 of 4 evaluation criteria (clarity, practicality, contextual relevance, creativity) from peer and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
